testStrictnessRequireRenew() - Method in class edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter.CASFilterTest
Test that the CASFilter will not accept a prior CASReceipt that does not meet its requirement that the authentication be from a presentation of primary credentials -- that is, with renew=true on the validation request.
